snippet: Senators Marco Rubio of Florida and Charles E. Grassley of Iowa were among those accusing the president of abusing his executive power by taking 23 executive actions on gun violence at the same time that he asked Congress to pass legislation.
abstract: Senators Marco Rubio of Florida and Charles E. Grassley of Iowa were among those accusing the president of abusing his executive power by taking 23 executive actions on gun violence at the same time that he asked Congress to pass legislation.

headline.main: Prominent Republicans Criticize Obama's Executive Actions
